mapper.insert: insert into member(email, password, name, registered_at, age, prefered_place_1, prefered_place_2, prefered_place_3, prefered_type) values (#{email}, #{password}, #{name}, now(), #{age}, #{preferedPlace1}, #{preferedPlace2}, #{preferedPlace3}, #{preferedType})
insert into member (email, registered_at, name) value (#{email}, now(), #{name});
mapper.select: select * from member where email = #{email} and password = #{password}
mapper.update: update member set password = #{password}, name = #{name}, age = #{age}, prefered_place_1 = #{preferedPlace1}, prefered_place_2 = #{preferedPlace2}, prefered_place_3 = #{preferedPlace3}, prefered_type = #{preferedType} where email = #{email}
